channel.title: Custom Dialogs :: Data Structures in C#
channel.description: Custom Dialogs While the dialogs provided by the .NET Framework are useful in a variety of applications, there are times when we need to be able to design our own special-purpose dialog to obtain specific information from the user. This section outlines how Visual Studio® can be used to build such a dialog. Let’s begin by considering a simple example.
